title: Cloudnoden
description: Cloudnoden is a free hosting company passionate about offering free hosting to friends and family.
roleDescription: I was responsible for the maintenance and management of servers and networking, including Pterodactyl, WHMCS, Virtfusion, Proxmox, PBS, and more..

title: Frohost
description: Frohost was a small hosting company with about 600 members. They were passionate about offering the most affordable game & web hosting available.
roleDescription: I oversaw the Support Team and spearheaded the development of several systems to enhance user experience. This included creating a comprehensive Pterodactyl theme and implementing a custom ticketing system.
